original_title: Tapestry: Asian Women in America (a.k.a. Tapestry II)
overview: Through archival photographs, oral histories and folk songs by Nobuko Miyamoto, this video weaves the history of 200 years of Asian women's experiences. It begins with early Asian immigration to the U.S. from China, Japan, Korea and the Philippines.
title: Tapestry: Asian Women in America (a.k.a. Tapestry II)
